page.title: 17FARMING IN LECHLADE CTD..
page.content: {Paradise Farm}also has some barley and wheat which are sold. The large potato crop is sold on the farm with eggs from the 38 chickens. Friesian and Guernsey Cows provide milk and 300 pigs are fattened for pork.{Butlers {Court Farm}and{Green Farm}are owned by Mr. Jenkinson.{Green Farm}has three barns and {Butlers Court Farm}consists of five barns and a parlour. There are 149 cattle including one Hereford Bull. There are Hereford and Friesians which give a good milk yield. The farms grow wheat, sweetcorn, maize and corn. The maize is used for feed and the corn and wheat are sold. In addition, to the South of the River{ {Mr. Kinch}farms 700 acres. He has grazing land for his dairy herd and grows wheat and barley which are sold to a merchant.
